messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2238.... about hslda
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/13/2002 10:45:19 AM Central Daylight Time, ... I am sorry, but I am unaware of what HSLDA is doing since I do not belong to them. If you
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/13/2002 10:45:19 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> Does anyone here blame HSLDA with all their unecessary stridency and
> willingness to divide homeschoolers for the loss of freedom we are
> experiencing? I wonder if all their activism is doing enough damage
> that it's really beginning to affect more people now....???
>
>
I am sorry, but I am unaware of what HSLDA is doing since I do not belong to
them.
If you all want, you can email me personally if it needs to be a off topic
issue.

Kim


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
